activities: Intelliteach, Inc. provides Service Desk outsourcing services to law firms around the world.  We work with law firms in the UK and other EU member states.  The service we provide may require these firms to send us the personal information of their employees.  We also collect personal information from our website contact forms for sales and employment inquiries.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: For human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); For all other types of data; TRUSTe Watchdog Service
